item.title: 备忘录称沙特阿拉伯和智利将恢复从巴西进口家禽
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份农业部周四发布的备忘录，沙特阿拉伯已经解除了从巴西最南端的南里奥格兰德州（Rio Grande do Sul）进口家禽的禁令。【原文：Saudi Arabia has lifted a ban on poultry imports from Brazil's southernmost state of Rio Grande do Sul, where an outbreak of bird flu was reported on a commercial poultry farm in May, according to an Agriculture Ministry memo issued on Thursday and seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 2024 年，在线零售商 Shein 在英国的收入增长了 32
item.description: 这家在线快速时尚零售商周五早些时候提交的一份文件显示，2024 年，Shein 的英国业务销售额达到 20.5 亿英镑（约合 27.7 亿美元），比上年增长 32.3%。【原文：Shein's British business made 2.05 billion pounds ($2.77 billion) in sales in 2024, a 32.3% increase from the previous year, a filing by the online fast-fashion retailer showed early on Friday.】

item.title: 日本第二季度经济增长快于预期
item.description: 日本政府周五公布的数据显示，日本经济在4-6月份按年率计算增长了1.0%，好于预期，但分析人士预计，美国关税对经济增长的全面打击要等到今后的数据公布后才能显现。【原文：Japan's economy expanded an annualised 1.0% in the April-June quarter, government data showed on Friday, beating forecasts, though analysts expect the full hit to growth from U.S. tariffs will not be seen until future releases.】

item.title: Kenvue 吸引激进投资者 Sachem Head 收购股份
item.description: 创可贴和泰诺生产商 Kenvue 在第二季度吸引了另一位激进投资者的注意，Sachem Head Capital Management 报告说它买入了这只股票。【原文：Band-Aid and Tylenol maker Kenvue attracted the attention of another activist investor in the second quarter, with Sachem Head Capital Management reporting that it bought into the stock.】

item.title: 日本经济 4-6 月按年率计算增长 1.0
item.description: 日本政府周五公布的数据显示，日本经济在 4-6 月份按年率计算增长了 1.0%，而市场预测中值为增长 0.4%。【原文：Japan's economy expanded an annualised 1.0% in the April-June quarter, government data showed on Friday, compared with a median market forecast for a 0.4% increase.】

item.title: 对冲基金在人工智能热潮中转而加倍押注大型科技公司
item.description: 华尔街最大的对冲基金布里奇沃特联合公司（Bridgewater Associates）、老虎环球管理公司（Tiger Global Management）和发现资本公司（Discovery Capital）在第二季度增加了对大型科技公司的投资，因为人工智能的发展掀起了一代又一代的热潮。【原文：Wall Street's largest hedge funds, Bridgewater Associates, Tiger Global Management and Discovery Capital, increased their exposure to Big Tech in the second quarter amid a generational boom in the growth of artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 激进派 Starboard 买入更多 Salesforce 股票，2022 年首次要求变革
item.description: 根据周四提交的一份监管文件，三年前最早公开推动 Salesforce 进行改革的投资者之一、激进投资者 Starboard Value 在第二季度增持了这家美国软件公司近 50% 的股份。【原文：Activist Starboard Value, one of the first investors to publicly push Salesforce to make changes three years ago, increased its stake in the U.S. software company by almost 50% in the second quarter, according to a regulatory filing on Thursday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚澳新银行公布第三季度存款和贷款增长情况
item.description: 澳大利亚澳新银行集团（ANZ Group）周五表示，第三季度客户存款和净贷款与垫款均有所增长，而信贷风险加权资产则因国内零售部门住房贷款的增长而有所上升。【原文：Australia's ANZ Group said on Friday its customer deposits and net loans and advances rose in the third quarter, while credit risk-weighted assets edged higher due to growth in home loans at its domestic retail division.】

item.title: 巴西生物燃料公司第二季度净利润 1.36 亿美元，躲过禽流感贸易干扰
item.description: 巴西食品加工商 BRF 是世界上最大的鸡肉出口商，该公司表示，尽管 5 月份爆发的禽流感引发了贸易禁令，导致贸易中断，但公司在第二季度仍获得了 7.35 亿雷亚尔（1.36 亿美元）的收入。【原文：Brazilian food processor BRF , the world's largest chicken exporter, said it earned 735 million reais ($136 million) in the second quarter despite trade disruptions caused by an outbreak of bird flu in May, which triggered trade bans.】

item.title: 大空头 "投资者伯利对第二季度转为看涨
item.description: 迈克尔-伯里（Michael Burry）的Scion资产管理公司周四提交的一份证券文件显示，该公司在第一季度结束时更加看好不同行业和地区的公司，而此前在特朗普政府考虑征收关税时，该公司曾对中国公司下注。【原文：Michael Burry's Scion Asset Management ended the first quarter more bullish on companies across different sectors and geographies, a securities filing showed on Thursday, after betting against Chinese companies previously as the Trump administration considered imposing tariffs.】

item.title: 巴西银行第二季度调整后净利润下降 60
item.description: 巴西国营银行巴西银行周四公布，第二季度调整后净利润为 38 亿雷亚尔（约合 7.024 亿美元），同比下降 60.2%，低于 LSEG 民意调查预期的 50 亿雷亚尔。【原文：Brazilian state-run lender Banco do Brasil posted on Thursday a net adjusted profit of 3.8 billion reais ($702.4 million) for the second quarter, down 60.2% from a year earlier and below the 5 billion reais expected in an LSEG poll.】

item.title: 巴西数字贷款机构 Nubank 第二季度净利润增长 42
item.description: 经营巴西数字贷款公司 Nubank 的 Nu 控股公司周四公布了 6.37 亿美元的第二季度净利润，按汇率中性计算，比去年同期增长了 42%。【原文：Nu Holdings , which runs Brazilian digital lender Nubank, posted on Thursday a $637 million second-quarter net profit, a 42% increase from a year earlier on a foreign exchange-neutral basis.】

item.title: Lyft 联合创始人将退出打车公司董事会
item.description: Lyft 周四表示，其联合创始人洛根-格林（Logan Green）和约翰-齐默（John Zimmer）在完成为期两年的过渡计划后，将退出这家打车服务提供商的董事会。【原文：Lyft said on Thursday its co-founders Logan Green and John Zimmer are stepping down from the ride-hailing services provider's board, following the completion of a two-year transition plan.】

item.title: 交易日 PPI 意外地剪断了鸽子的翅膀
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 伯克希尔投资 UnitedHealth，减持苹果股份
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）周四透露，该公司已开始投资联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group），因为这家保险公司已成为许多对美国医疗保健发展方向感到不满的美国人的攻击目标。【原文：Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway disclosed on Thursday that it has begun investing in UnitedHealth Group after the insurer became a target for many Americans upset over the direction of the nation's healthcare.】

item.title: 美联储主席鲍威尔将于 8 月 22 日发表讲话，外界纷纷猜测其降息和接替人选
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周四表示，美联储将于下周五在怀俄明州杰克逊霍尔举行的堪萨斯城联储中央银行年会上就经济前景和美联储政策框架审查发表讲话。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell will give a speech on the economic outlook and the Fed's review of its policy framework next Friday at the Kansas City Fed's annual central banking conference in Jackson Hole, Wyoming, the Fed said on Thursday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，美国联邦贸易委员会对 Hims & Hers 公司的广告和取消订单行为进行调查
item.description: 据彭博新闻社援引知情人士的话报道，美国联邦贸易委员会正在调查有关远程医疗平台 Hims & Hers 的广告和取消订单行为的投诉。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission is probing complaints about Telehealth platform Hims & Hers regarding its advertising and cancellation practices, according to a Bloomberg News report citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: GAMCO 因涉嫌在 Skydance 交易中亏空派拉蒙投资者而起诉 Redstone
item.description: 亿万富翁投资人马里奥-加贝利（Mario Gabelli）的投资基金代表派拉蒙全球公司股东提起集体诉讼，称该公司控股股东莎莉-雷德斯通（Shari Redstone）在与 Skydance Media 公司价值 84 亿美元的合并案中不公平地从中获益。【原文：Billionaire investor Mario Gabelli's investment fund filed a class-action lawsuit on behalf of Paramount Global shareholders alleging the company's controlling shareholder, Shari Redstone, benefited unfairly at their expense in the $8.4-billion merger with Skydance Media, according to a statement from Gabelli's firm.】

item.title: 巴菲特的伯克希尔公司收购联合健康 500 万股股票
item.description: 周四的一份监管文件显示，沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）收购了联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）的 500 万股股票，使得这家医疗保险公司的股价在盘后交易中上涨了 7%。【原文：Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway has acquired 5 million shares in UnitedHealth Group , a regulatory filing showed on Thursday, sending the health insurer's stock up 7% in extended trading.】

item.title: 美国在价值 2.75 亿美元的自动售水机庞氏骗局案中起诉两人
item.description: 美国当局称，一名华盛顿州企业家和一名前杰富瑞投资组合经理周四因涉及自动售水机的庞氏骗局和相关欺诈受到刑事指控，总金额高达 2.75 亿美元，受害者包括退伍军人。【原文：A Washington state entrepreneur and a former Jefferies portfolio manager were criminally charged on Thursday over a Ponzi scheme and related fraud involving water vending machines that totaled as much as $275 million, with military veterans among the victims, U.S. authorities said.】

item.title: 应用材料公司季度营收低于预期，股价暴跌
item.description: 应用材料公司周四预计第四季度营收低于预期，理由是经济不确定性导致客户需求不稳定，股价在盘后交易中下跌了 11%。【原文：Applied Materials forecast fourth-quarter revenue below estimates on Thursday, citing bumpy demand from clients amid economic uncertainty, sending its shares down 11% in extended trading.】

item.title: Kyivstar 将于 8 月 15 日在纽约上市
item.description: 乌克兰最大的移动运营商 Kyivstar 周四表示，其股票将于 8 月 15 日开始在纳斯达克交易，成为第一家在美国证券交易所上市的乌克兰公司。【原文：Ukraine's biggest mobile operator, Kyivstar, said on Thursday its shares will begin trading on the Nasdaq on August 15, making it the first Ukrainian company to be listed on a U.S. stock exchange.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，美国考虑入股英特尔公司
item.description: 彭博新闻社周四援引熟悉该计划的人士的话报道称，特朗普政府正在与英特尔谈判，希望美国政府有可能入股这家芯片制造商。【原文：The Trump administration is in talks with Intel to have the U.S. government potentially take a stake in the chipmaker, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the plan.】

item.title: 特朗普人力资源主管预测美国政府今年将裁员30万
item.description: 特朗普政府新任人力资源主管周四表示，今年可能将裁减约30万名员工，这相当于自1月份以来联邦员工人数减少了12.5%。【原文：The Trump administration will likely shed around 300,000 workers this year, its new human resources chief said on Thursday, which would amount to a 12.5% decrease in the federal workforce since January.】

item.title: 路透社报道 Meta 的人工智能政策后，美国参议员呼吁对 Meta 进行调查
item.description: 在路透社独家报道了一份允许该公司的聊天机器人 "与儿童进行浪漫或感性的对话 "的内部政策文件后，两位美国共和党参议员周四呼吁国会对 Meta Platforms 展开调查。【原文：Two Republican U.S. senators called for a congressional investigation into Meta Platforms on Thursday after Reuters exclusively reported on an internal policy document that permitted the company’s chatbots to “engage a child in conversations that are romantic or sensual.”】

item.title: 消息人士称巴拿马运河将就两个港口的建设和运营进行招标
item.description: 一位参与筹备工作的消息人士周四表示，巴拿马运河将很快开始与可能感兴趣的公司进行磋商，以便在明年第一季度启动竞争性招标，在其区域内建设和运营两个新港口。【原文：The Panama Canal will soon begin consults with potentially interested companies to launch in the first quarter next year a competitive tender offering two new ports for construction and operation within its zone, a source involved in the preparations said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国批准可能以 5 亿美元的价格向巴林出售火箭系统
item.description: 五角大楼周四表示，美国国务院已批准可能向巴林出售M142高机动性火炮火箭系统及相关设备，估计费用为5亿美元。【原文：The U.S. State Department has approved a potential sale of the M142 High Mobility Artillery Rocket System and related equipment to Bahrain for an estimated cost of $500 million, the Pentagon said on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家报道巴西立法者爱德华多-博尔索纳罗警告美国将采取更多制裁措施，甚至可能征收关税
item.description: 巴西众议员爱德华多-博尔索纳罗（Eduardo Bolsonaro）是前总统雅伊尔-博尔索纳罗（Jair Bolsonaro）的儿子，他周四告诉路透社记者，由于美国对他父亲的法律打击，他预计美国将对巴西官员实施更多制裁，并可能征收更多关税。【原文：Brazilian Congressman Eduardo Bolsonaro, the son of former President Jair Bolsonaro, told Reuters on Thursday that he expects additional U.S. sanctions against Brazilian officials and possibly more tariffs due to a legal crackdown on his father.】

item.title: 独家报道：加拿大统计机构提前发布数据，然后又将其撤下
item.description: 加拿大统计局网站周四显示，该局在周五原定发布日期之前，在其网站上公布了有关 6 月份制造业数据的市场敏感信息。【原文：Statistics Canada posted market-sensitive information about June manufacturing data on its website ahead of the scheduled release date on Friday, the agency's website showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国最高法院暂时拒绝阻止密西西比州社交媒体年龄检查法
item.description: 美国最高法院周四拒绝搁置密西西比州要求社交媒体平台用户核实年龄并征得未成年人父母同意的法律，该法律是由一个贸易团体提出的，该团体成员包括 Meta 的 Facebook、Alphabet 的 YouTube 和 Snapchat。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court declined on Thursday to put on hold Mississippi law requiring that users of social media platforms verify their age and that minors have parental consent in a challenge by a trade group whose members include Meta's Facebook, Alphabet's YouTube and Snapchat .】
